sentences.en: Cosmic Infuser - 1 h Mace, swings on plate for about 1 - 2 k .
sentences.cn: CosmicInfuser单手锤, 打板甲 1-2千 伤害.

sentences.en: Do you want me to mace your face ? Then shut up!
sentences.cn: 你想让我给你点厉害瞧瞧 吗 ?还不闭嘴!

sentences.en: Dr. Mace would be assisted by scientific specialists in the agency.
sentences.cn: 该机构的其他科学专家将协助梅斯博士的工作.

sentences.en: From Mace's increasingly frightened expression, Lord knew his last random shot had hit home.
sentences.cn: 洛德从梅斯那更加惊恐的表情上断定, 他最后那支乱箭射中了要害.

sentences.en: He seems scared stiff any time Mace's name comes up.
sentences.cn: 似乎一提到梅斯的名字他就怕得要命.

sentences.en: Is tendon sheath mace excuse me phlogistic how to treat?
sentences.cn: 请问腱鞘锏炎怎么治疗?

sentences.en: It was obvious that Mace recognized instantly the top item - one of the brokerage transaction slips.
sentences.cn: 显然,梅斯立即认出了放在最上面的那张 -- 一份经纪人交易单据.

sentences.en: Keeping the same lustful look , she unhooking her small mace.
sentences.cn: 她却卸下她的小锤子,继续用欲望的眼神看着马库斯.

sentences.en: Lord and Mace would be destroyed, of course - a thought which left her unconcerned.
sentences.cn: 洛德和梅斯当然会垮掉,她对这并不操心.

sentences.en: Lot 1784 should be Hunan Offcial Mint , 1 Mace Silver Cake.
sentences.cn: 第1784号拍品应为湖南省造湖南官局壹钱银饼.

sentences.en: Mace was attempting to recover ; there was savage hatred in his eyes.
sentences.cn: 梅斯试图重新振作起来, 眼里射出凶残、仇恨的光.

sentences.en: Relishing his power, Mace ruled that the entire test sequence should be done again.
sentences.cn: 凭借手中的权力, 梅斯认定,整个试验必须从头再来一遍.

sentences.en: Some wild cattails besides the pool have already sprouted reed mace.
sentences.cn: 池塘边有一些野生的香蒲已经长出了蒲棒.

sentences.en: The Speaker is preceded by the mace-bearer upon his entry to the chamber.
sentences.cn: 当议长走进议事厅的时候，前面由执议长权标的人开路。

sentences.en: The sword and mace were favourite weapons for hand - to - hand fighting .
sentences.cn: 剑和狼牙棒是 肉搏战 的最佳武器.

trans.tran_cn: 权杖，狼牙棒（古代兵器），肉豆蔻干皮，肉豆蔻种衣（用作香料）
trans.tran_en: a spice made from the dried shell of a  nutmeg
